description: AIWG SDLC framework rules - deployable enforcement policies

core.description: Universal rules deployed to ALL platforms. Non-negotiable defaults every AIWG user can count on.

sdlc.description: Rules specific to SDLC workflow enforcement. Deployed with `aiwg use sdlc`.
